title: Emerald Grace: Diamond-Studded Jhumka Kundanalu with South Sea Pearl Drop
materials: South Sea Pearl (Mutyalu). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Elaborate filigree work with diamond-studded floral and paisley motifs. Features a secure screw-back post. The Jhumka (bell) shape showcases intricate detailing and fine craftsmanship. The drop features a lustrous South Sea Pearl. The design integrates modern diamond setting techniques with traditional South Indian artistry.
colors: Gold (Swarna) with white diamonds and a vibrant green emerald accent
finished with the soft white of the South Sea Pearl.
occasions: or a sophisticated evening event. A statement piece for the modern woman who appreciates tradition.
description: A timeless blend of tradition and luxury. Exquisite craftsmanship showcasing the skill of Hyderabad's finest artisans. The perfect balance of heritage and contemporary elegance. The brilliant diamonds sparkle, adding glamour and radiance. Emerald highlights the richness of gold. A unique piece of heirloom jewelry.
